title: Underweight Europe on Italian election concerns, says Oliver Pursche
text:
Underweight Europe on Italian election concerns, says Oliver Pursche 12:34am IST - 05:21
Bruderman Brothers' chief market strategist explains in a chat with Reuters' Fred Katayama why he cut his recommended exposure to European equities and why he has become more defensive in U.S. equities.
